mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS photo , p.POSTDATE AS photoDate FROM POST p JOIN PHOTO h ON p.POSTNO = h.POSTNO WHERE 1=1 AND p.POSTDATE >= #{startDate} AND p.POSTDATE <= #{endDate} GROUP BY p.POSTDATE ORDER BY p.POSTDATE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS Story , p.POSTDATE AS storyDate FROM POST p JOIN STORY s ON p.SNO = s.SNO WHERE 1=1 AND p.POSTDATE >= #{startDate} AND p.POSTDATE <= #{endDate} GROUP BY p.POSTDATE ORDER BY p.POSTDATE
